content.body: There's still some discussion over how it should behave with script & preloading https://github.com/whatwg/html/issues/11669#issuecomment-3550088089. Do you think this blocks moving to stage 2? If not I'm fine with it and we can continue to discuss. zcorpan does this make sense with the stages model?
